targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	$__time(date),
	convert_km(speed::numeric, '$length_unit') AS speed_${length_unit}h,
	power,
	convert_km(${preferred_range}_battery_range_km, '$length_unit') AS range_${preferred_range}_${length_unit},
	convert_km(est_battery_range_km, '$length_unit') AS range_estimated_${length_unit},
	battery_level,
	usable_battery_level,
	battery_heater::integer
FROM
	positions
WHERE
 car_id = $car_id AND
 $__timeFilter(date)
ORDER BY
	date ASC

SELECT
  $__time(date),
  latitude,
  longitude
FROM positions
WHERE 
  car_id = $car_id AND 
  $__timeFilter(date)
ORDER BY 
  date ASC

SELECT
	$__time(date),
	ROUND(convert_m(elevation, '$alternative_length_unit')) AS elevation_${alternative_length_unit}
FROM
	positions
WHERE
 car_id = $car_id AND
 $__timeFilter(date)
ORDER BY
	date ASC

SELECT
	$__time(date),
	convert_celsius(outside_temp, '$temp_unit') AS outside_temp_$temp_unit,
	convert_celsius(inside_temp, '$temp_unit') AS inside_temp_$temp_unit,
	convert_celsius(driver_temp_setting, '$temp_unit') as driver_temp_$temp_unit,
	convert_celsius(passenger_temp_setting, '$temp_unit') as passenger_temp_$temp_unit,
  is_climate_on::integer,
	fan_status
FROM
	positions
WHERE
 car_id = $car_id AND
 $__timeFilter(date)
ORDER BY
	date ASC

SELECT
    $__time(date),
    convert_tire_pressure(tpms_pressure_fl,'$pressure_unit') AS tpms_pressure_front_left_$pressure_unit,
    convert_tire_pressure(tpms_pressure_fr,'$pressure_unit') AS tpms_pressure_front_right_$pressure_unit,
    convert_tire_pressure(tpms_pressure_rl,'$pressure_unit') AS tpms_pressure_rear_left_$pressure_unit,
    convert_tire_pressure(tpms_pressure_rr,'$pressure_unit') AS tpms_pressure_rear_right_$pressure_unit
FROM
    positions
WHERE
    car_id = $car_id AND
    $__timeFilter(date) AND
    tpms_pressure_fl is not null
ORDER BY
    date ASC

SELECT CONCAT_WS(' - ', round(convert_km(start_km::numeric, '$length_unit')), round(convert_km(end_km::numeric, '$length_unit'))) ||' $length_unit' as "Odometer"
FROM drives d
WHERE d.id = $drive_id

SELECT ((DATE_PART('day', end_date - start_date) * 24 + 
                DATE_PART('hour', end_date - start_date)) * 60 +
                DATE_PART('minute', end_date - start_date)) * 60 +
                DATE_PART('second', end_date - start_date) as sec_diff
FROM drives
WHERE drives.id = $drive_id;

SELECT 
    speed_section_$length_unit AS "Speed",
    SUM(seconds_elapsed) * 100 / MAX(duration) as "Elapsed",
    TO_CHAR((SUM(seconds_elapsed) || ' second')::interval, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS "Time"
FROM (
    SELECT
        ROUND(convert_km(p.speed::numeric, '$length_unit') / 10,0) * 10 AS speed_section_$length_unit,
        EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (LEAD(p."date") OVER (ORDER BY p."date") - p."date")) AS seconds_elapsed,
        EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (end_date - start_date)) AS duration
    FROM drives d
    INNER JOIN positions p ON p.drive_id = d.id
    WHERE d.id = $drive_id
) AS drivedata
WHERE speed_section_$length_unit>0
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1
select convert_km(distance::numeric, '$length_unit') as "$length_unit" from drives where id = $drive_id;

WITH height as (SELECT
	elevation-LAG(elevation,1) over ( order BY
	date ASC ) as diff
FROM
	positions
WHERE
 car_id = $car_id AND
 $__timeFilter(date)
ORDER BY
	date ASC
	)
SELECT  ROUND(convert_m(sum(diff), '$alternative_length_unit')::numeric,0) || ' $alternative_length_unit'  as "UP" from height where diff > 0

WITH height as (SELECT
	elevation-LAG(elevation,1) over ( order BY
	date ASC ) as diff
FROM
	positions
WHERE
 car_id = $car_id AND
 $__timeFilter(date)
ORDER BY
	date ASC
	)
SELECT ROUND(convert_m(sum(diff), '$alternative_length_unit')::numeric,0) || ' $alternative_length_unit' as "DOWN" from height where diff < 0

SELECT
	(NULLIF(GREATEST(start_${preferred_range}_range_km - end_${preferred_range}_range_km, 0), 0) * car.efficiency)
FROM
	drives d
JOIN cars car ON car.id = car_id
WHERE
	d.id = $drive_id;

panels.description:
Shows how much energy has been recovered through regenerative braking.

"Energy recovered" is already included in "Energy consumed (net)" and is determined by looking for periods with negative power within your drive. 

Requires Streaming API to be enabled and available for this drive.

targets.rawSql:
with data as (
select
	p.power,
	extract (second from p.date - lag(p.date) over (order by p.date)) as seconds
from positions p
	where drive_id = ${drive_id} and power < 0
)

select sum(power * (seconds / 3600)) * -1 from data where seconds is not null and seconds < 1.5

panels.title: Energy recovered

targets.rawSql:
select
	(NULLIF(GREATEST(start_${preferred_range}_range_km - end_${preferred_range}_range_km, 0), 0) * car.efficiency) *1000 /
	  convert_km(distance::numeric, '$length_unit') as "$length_unit"
from drives d
JOIN cars car ON car.id = car_id
where d.id = $drive_id;

SELECT
	convert_km(avg(speed)::numeric, '$length_unit') AS speed_${length_unit}h
FROM positions
WHERE car_id = $car_id AND $__timeFilter(date)

list.definition:
SELECT
    id as __value,
    CASE WHEN COUNT(id) OVER (PARTITION BY name) > 1 AND name IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(name, ' - ', RIGHT(vin, 6)) ELSE COALESCE(name, CONCAT('VIN ', vin)) end as __text 
FROM cars
ORDER BY display_priority ASC, name ASC, vin ASC;
list.label: Car
list.name: car_id
list.query:
SELECT
    id as __value,
    CASE WHEN COUNT(id) OVER (PARTITION BY name) > 1 AND name IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT(name, ' - ', RIGHT(vin, 6)) ELSE COALESCE(name, CONCAT('VIN ', vin)) end as __text 
FROM cars
ORDER BY display_priority ASC, name ASC, vin ASC;

list.definition: select case when unit_of_length = 'km' then 'm' when unit_of_length = 'mi' then 'ft' end  from settings limit 1;
list.name: alternative_length_unit
list.query: select case when unit_of_length = 'km' then 'm' when unit_of_length = 'mi' then 'ft' end  from settings limit 1;

list.definition: SELECT  CASE WHEN '$length_unit' = 'km' THEN 'km/h' WHEN '$length_unit' = 'mi' THEN 'mph' END
list.name: speed_unit
list.query: SELECT  CASE WHEN '$length_unit' = 'km' THEN 'km/h' WHEN '$length_unit' = 'mi' THEN 'mph' END
